title: How to Complete Adventure Rank Ascension Quests (Genshin Impact)

steps.title: Enter the Midsummer Courtyard domain.
steps.content: Enter the Midsummer Courtyard domain. This domain is one of the first domains that you will encounter in the game. It is located northeast closest to where you started in Starsnatch Cliff. The recommended party level is the same as your target enemy level after ascension (35/60/80/90). While not necessary, it is recommended that your team consists of a pyro character, an anemo character, a hydro character, and a cryo character.

steps.title: Defeat the Hilichurls outside of the round arena.
steps.content: Defeat the Hilichurls outside of the round arena. This should be as simple as knocking them over the edge. There are also a few boxes that you can break to get ingredients for cooking.

steps.title: Enter the round arena.
steps.content: Enter the round arena. This is where the first major fight occurs. Here, you will have to defeat three Hilichurls, a wooden shield Mitachurl, and a Ruin Guard . Tackle the Hilichurls first then use Cryo and Hydro to freeze the Ruin Guard or Mitachurl and Anemo to spread the effect. After defeating, the barrier to the next battle will open.

steps.title: Fly through the air and defeat the Hydro Abyss Mage and the Electro/Cryo Hilichurl archers.
steps.content: Fly through the air and defeat the Hydro Abyss Mage and the Electro/Cryo Hilichurl archers. Be wary of the lasers, they can interrupt your flight and deal damage continuously. There should be a wooden container containing more ingredients.

steps.title: Defeat the Hilichurls and the Mitachurls in the next room.
steps.content: Defeat the Hilichurls and the Mitachurls in the next room. After flying down, you will find more enemies to defeat. All the enemies in that room have to be defeated before you can proceed to the next chamber. Don't forget about the wooden boxes and barrels. Those may contain ingredients for cooking later. Focus on the Mitachurl as it can be difficult to defeat. Use Pyro to break its shield then use Anemo to spread the effect to the Mitachurl and the Hilichurls.

steps.title: Tackle the Hilichurls and the Fatui Pyro Agent.
steps.content: Tackle the Hilichurls and the Fatui Pyro Agent. Approach the huge key in the next room and touch it to start the challenge. Focus mainly on the Fatui agent as it can deal the most damage; he is the hardest to defeat. Also keep your eye on the clock as if it runs out, you will have to start all over again.

steps.title: Glide down to the next room.
steps.content: Glide down to the next room. After completing this area, move on down. In this room, you will have to dodge lasers that are moving. It should be pretty straightforward.

steps.title: Fly between platforms.
steps.content: Fly between platforms. The room following has two Cryo Hilichurl archers firing shots at you. Avoid falling into the water; this will make it easy to get Frozen. Instead, navigate between platforms. Don't forget to break the barrels as there may be ingredients inside. Once you reach the doorway, knock the Hilichurls into the water to drown them.

steps.title: Defeat the Abyss Mages.
steps.content: Defeat the Abyss Mages. At the end of the corridor are two Abyss Mages: Cryo and Hydro. To do so, use Pyro to break the Cryo Abyss Mageâ€™s shield, and Electro for the Hydro Abyss Mage. You could also use Anemo to blend their elements together. Once you have broken their shield, you can just deal more physical damage to defeat them.

steps.title: Touch the key in the center.
steps.content: Touch the key in the center. The last enemy you will have to defeat is an Electro Hypostasis . Once you have done so, a Luxurious Chest spawns. Your max Adventure Rank increases by 5, and your World Level increases by 1. If you accumulated a lot of Adventure EXP, your World Level may increase by 2.

steps.title: Claim your rewards.
steps.content: Claim your rewards. Don't forget to go to the Adventurer's Guild when you are done to obtain all your rewards.
